SamPy.resolve.misc.modifyArcs.generateIRAFcopy¶

SamPy.resolve.misc.modifyArcs.generateIRAFcopy(scis, arcs, matches, x=[15, 80], out='modifyArcs.cl')¶

Generates a file that can be fed to IRAF to generate a punch of temp files for data.

Parameters:
  • scis – a list of science images
  • arcs – a list of arc images
  • matches – a dictionary showing a mapping between a science image and arc images
  • x – a list of x coordinate positions to describe the cutout region from the science image. These values shuold bracket the sky line.
  • out – name of the IRAF command file
Returns:

None
